igV4Mb"]},"src/interfaces/IContractSigner.sol":{"keccak256":"0x539695f16b1d57c19ff7f7e60cf3a2c5b5a2ed665b4c9f73c84128c7a1c2bf8c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a8106cf4335515cfb46d34c52a9b3a5c575c0a3f9d34f4534524a9ff818832d5","dweb:/ipfs/QmWTiCcsi5YqgGDvwaKintZP3749gpeku5W2CQPRJENUCE"]},"src/interfaces/IConvexoLPs.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc944b254ed28b3cf78037664259459d0a787b11d2e1adad0ff0a8eab10f40c35","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://54cbb0498e91badcab338640e0afccd7faba323d8a88d79542519d60b5430f2e","dweb:/ipfs/QmRKGG771tVPfdwrzeENYSEf2uw3sWccb6Hieuj8NhVtSx"]},"src/interfaces/IConvexoVaults.sol":{"keccak256":"0x70a71a9442b608f5b0dbc62681b23fdebddcfc7f88d87f677abb27dc4eaa0ecb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://520427d3b68e760d21da5edaf63e096d9093a20179835aad2907af82a0bf9bac","dweb:/ipfs/QmQsVhMJFywgpNe4g4TYeRB6vuenkM6i2iG3PpY4mamB45"]}},"version":1}

params.interestRate: The interest rate in basis points (e.g., 1200 = 12%)
params.name: The name of the vault token
params.protocolFeeRate: The protocol fee rate in basis points (e.g., 200 = 2%)
params.symbol: The symbol of the vault token

returns.vaultAddress: The address of the created vault
returns.vaultId: The ID of the created vault

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns._0: The vault address at that index

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.newCollector: The new protocol fee collector address

createVault(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Create a new vault (borrower must have Tier 2 NFT)

getVault(uint256).notice: Get vault address by vault ID

getVaultAddressAtIndex(uint256).notice: Get vault address at a specific index

vaults(uint256).notice: Mapping from vault ID to vault address
